subTitle: Ask us anything about Kraffe Roasters, our commercial coffee roasting machines, and our services. Get factual responses to guide your decision.

faqs.question: What are the key advantages of Kraffe Coffee Roasters?
faqs.answer: Kraffe Coffee Roasters combine precision engineering, energy efficiency, and custom design with premium European components. They offer flexible controls, global support, and consistent high-quality roasting for both experts and aspiring roasters.

faqs.question: Are Kraffe roasters compatible with Artisan and Cropster?
faqs.answer: Yes. Kraffe Roasters integrate seamlessly with Artisan and Cropster, allowing you to connect via laptop and use these trusted third-party platforms for roast profiling and control.

faqs.question: What customer support does Kraffe provide?
faqs.answer: Kraffe offers free lifetime online support, remote troubleshooting, and fast responses. We collaborate with certified service partners worldwide to ensure reliable after-sales assistance.

faqs.question: What safety systems do Kraffe Roasters include?
faqs.answer: Kraffe Roasters feature advanced temperature/drum pressure monitoring, automatic shutoffs, and safety alerts to protect both operators and equipment during roasting.

faqs.question: What components are used in Kraffe Roasters?
faqs.answer: Kraffe uses premium European components: Bonfiglioli motors (Italy), Siemens/Schneider electrical systems (Germany/France), and 3mm thermocouples. All machines meet CE safety standards.

faqs.question: Why does Kraffe use third-party roasting software?
faqs.answer: Kraffe prioritizes compatibility with industry-standard tools like Artisan and Cropster instead of proprietary software. This ensures flexibility, regular updates, and familiarity for users.

faqs.question: What are preheat and end-of-day modes?
faqs.answer: Preheat mode brings the drum to optimal starting temperatures for consistency. End-of-day mode cools the system and prepares it for safe, energy-efficient shutdown.

faqs.question: What automation features do Kraffe Roasters offer?
faqs.answer: Kraffe supports automatic profile roasting, touchscreen/laptop control, and optional full automation. Adjust airflow, flame, drum speed, and save/repeat profiles with precision.

faqs.question: How do Kraffe Roasters ensure consistency?
faqs.answer: Consistency is achieved through 3mm thermocouples for real-time data, insulated bodies to block environmental interference, and precise repeatable controls for every roast profile.

faqs.question: What is the lead time and transport process?
faqs.answer: Standard lead times are 4-8 weeks (varies by customization). We arrange global delivery through trusted logistics partners upon request.

faqs.question: What capacity range do Kraffe Roasters cover?
faqs.answer: Kraffe machines handle batches from 0.5kg to 240kg, supporting everything from small specialty roasts to high-volume production. Hourly output depends on the model.

faqs.question: What defines a 'batch' and roasting cycle time?
faqs.answer: A batch is one full load of green coffee. Roasting takes 12–14 minutes per batch (profile-dependent), followed by 2–4 minutes of cooling.

faqs.question: Can Kraffe Roasters handle light to dark roast styles?
faqs.answer: Yes. Kraffe’s modulated premix burner system supports all roast styles, from light/fast development to bold dark roasts, and performs reliably in diverse climates.

faqs.question: What burner type does Kraffe use?
faqs.answer: All Kraffe models use high-efficiency premix gas burners for precise flame control, fast response times, and reduced fuel consumption.

faqs.question: What controls are available on Kraffe Roasters?
faqs.answer: Operators can manually or automatically adjust airflow, flame level, and drum speed to fine-tune roast profiles for desired results.

faqs.question: What are the benefits of the 10-inch touchscreen?
faqs.answer: The touchscreen provides real-time metrics (temperature/ROR/development time), profile labeling/saving, multi-language support, and intuitive roast parameter control.

faqs.question: How energy efficient are Kraffe Roasters?
faqs.answer: Optimized insulation, high-efficiency burners, and adjustable airflow minimize heat loss and gas usage, reducing operational costs without sacrificing quality.

faqs.question: What is the lifespan of a Kraffe Roaster?
faqs.answer: Kraffe Roasters are built to last 15–20 years with robust construction, premium components, and ongoing maintenance/spare parts support.

faqs.question: How easy is Kraffe Roaster maintenance?
faqs.answer: Designed for simplicity: easily accessible components, straightforward cleaning routines, and remote/maintenance guide support.

faqs.question: What are the installation requirements?
faqs.answer: Installation requires a chimney/flue system, proper gas/electrical connections, ventilation, and clearance. Clear documentation and online guidance are provided.

faqs.question: What electrical/gas options are available?
faqs.answer: Kraffe supports single-phase or three-phase electrical (model-dependent) and both LPG (propane) or natural gas configurations.

faqs.question: Do you offer user training?
faqs.answer: Yes. SCA-certified partners provide comprehensive training (online/in-person) on operation, profiling, maintenance, and safety.

faqs.question: Does Kraffe have global distributors?
faqs.answer: Yes. A growing network of global partners and certified distributors ensures local technical support, service, and fast delivery.

faqs.question: What is the warranty period?
faqs.answer: All machines include a 2-year standard warranty covering components/manufacturing. Extended warranties are available upon request.
